doc:
Hiroshi Kashiwagi https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hiroshi_Kashiwagi 0 Hiroshi Kashiwagi is a Nisei (second-generation Japanese American) poet, playwright and actor. For his writing and performance work on stage he is considered an early pioneer of Asian American theatre. Hiroshi_Kashiwagi is a_Nisei ( second-generation_Japanese_American ) poet_,_playwright_and_actor . For his_writing_and_performance_work on stage he is_considered an_early_pioneer of Asian_American_theatre .
